meanings.sent1: The garden was so flowerful with all the colorful blooms.
meanings.sent2: The meadow looked flowerful with a variety of blossoms.
meanings.sent3: The flowerful garden made the bees very happy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as flowerful as a blooming field.
meanings.sent5: The flowerful scene painted a vivid picture of nature's beauty.

meanings.sent1: The flowerful bouquet brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The park was flowerful with many different types of flowers.
meanings.sent3: The flowerful display at the market caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a flowerful explosion of colors.
meanings.sent5: The flowerful landscape was a sight to behold on a sunny day.
